metadata.Description: The application of artificial intelligence techniques to optimize the operation and management of smart grids.

sub-elements.Description: Machine learning algorithms are used in AI for smart grid optimization to analyze data and make predictions for optimizing the performance of the smart grid.
Data analytics is a sub-element of AI for smart grid optimization that involves the analysis of large amounts of data collected from the smart grid to gain insights and improve its efficiency.
Optimization models are used in AI for smart grid optimization to find the best solutions for managing and controlling the smart grid operations, considering various constraints and objectives.
